issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: As a result of ARROW-11009/ARROW-11049/etc. it is now possible to switch allocators at runtime.  Previously only one allocator was compiled into the released builds (e.g. the PYPI version of pyarrow only included jemalloc on Linux and mimalloc on Windows).  It might now make sense to compile both mimalloc and jemalloc on Linux builds to allow the user to switch out to the appropriate allocator at runtime if they need to.

comments.body: The conda packages already come with both.
Oops, ARROW-11212 is only about Python wheels. Other kinds of binary packages should be updated too.
I'll use this issue for deb/RPM because it seems that other packages have their own issues.
